steps.description: Get the root JSON

2.stage: Search the tubes by barcode and then search their corresponding order. Assign a batch to the tubes in the orders.

steps.description: Find the tubes by barcodes for ["XX111111K", "XX222222K"]
Get the search results (tubes)
Find the order by tube uuid and role
Get the search results (order)
Create a new batch
Assign the batch uuid to the tubes in the order items
Find the tubes by barcodes for ["XX333333K"]
Get the search results (tubes)
Find the order by tube uuid and role
Get the search results (order)
Assign the batch uuid to the tubes in the order items
Create the search order by batch
Get the result orders
Change the status of the order to pending
Change the status of the order to in_progress
Change the status of the order to pending
Change the status of the order to in_progress

6.stage: [Order 1] Create binding_spin_columns_dna spin columns. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna and by_product_tube tubes.

steps.description: Create new spin columns
Create new tubes
Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of the binding_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of the by_product_tube to done. Change the status of the tube_to_be_extracted to unused

7.stage: [Order 2] Create binding_spin_columns_dna spin columns. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna and by_product_tube tubes.

steps.description: Create new spin columns
Create new tubes
Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of the binding_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of the by_product_tube to done. Change the status of the tube_to_be_extracted to unused

8.stage: [Order 1] Use the binding_spin_column_dna spins in a new role elution_spin_column_dna. Then transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the binding_spin_column_dna under the role elution_spin_column_dna and start them.
Change the status of elution_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_dna to unused
Create new tubes
Add the extracted_dna_tube in the order and start them
Transfer elution_spin_column_dna into extracted_tube
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of elution_spin_column_dna to unused

9.stage: [Order 2] Use the binding_spin_column_dna spins in a new role elution_spin_column_dna. Then transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the binding_spin_column_dna under the role elution_spin_column_dna and start them.
Change the status of elution_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_dna to unused
Create new tubes
Add the extracted_dna_tube in the order and start them
Transfer elution_spin_column_dna into extracted_tube
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of elution_spin_column_dna to unused

10.stage: [Order 1] Create new tube_to_be_extracted tube. Transfer from by_product_tube into tube_to_be_extracted.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add tube_to_be_extracted tubes in the order and start them.
Transfer from by_product_tube tubes into tube_to_be_extracted tubes
Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to done

11.stage: [Order 2] Create new tube_to_be_extracted tube. Transfer from by_product_tube into tube_to_be_extracted.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add tube_to_be_extracted tubes in the order and start them.

Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to done

16.stage: [Order 1] RNA post extraction tube racking. Create new tubes. Add them in the order. Transfer RNA extracted tubes into 2D tubes. Then rack the 2D tubes in a tube rack.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add the 2d tubes in the order and start them
Transfer extracted tubes into 2D tubes
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to unused. Change the status of 2d tubes to complete
Create a new tube rack
Add the tube rack in the order and start it
Change the type of the rube rack to complete
